projectGridLines.title: Title: AR/VR for Indian Monuments and Museums,,  Title: Gen AI for immersive audio and video generation
projectGridLines.description:
Title: AR/VR for Indian Monuments and Museums

Description: We want to bring monuments and museums to life using AR technology. Visitors can wear Holo lens or google lens and visualise a dinosaur moving when it was alive, or a stone chariot moving during peak time of Hampi

Skill sets: Image recognition, understanding of 3D models, Unity 3D

Traits expectation: Learning mindset, High Ownership, Good attitude, Accountability, Skillset

Expected learning: System design, object oriented design, Unity 3D, Technical systems integration, Technologies like Python, Golang, React Js 

Specific courses required for project execution:  Unity 3D, Integration with Holo Lens


Title: Gen AI for immersive audio and video generation


Description: We want to generate immersive audio and video from the given textual script. The script will be engaging and it narrates history and background of the monuments

Skill sets: Python, React JS, Gen AI

Traits expectation: Learning mindset, High Ownership, Good attitude, Accountability, Skillset

Expected learning: System design, object oriented design, Technical systems integration, Technologies like Python, React JS, Gen AI

Specific courses required for project execution:  Python, React JS, Gen AI
